metadata.title: CVE-2022-23134 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
After the initial setup process, some steps of setup.php file are reachablenot only by super-administrators, but by unauthenticated users as well.Malicious actor can pass step checks and potentially change theconfiguration of Zabbix Frontend.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23134` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zabbix-agent - 5.4.9rc2
zabbix-agent2 - 5.4.9rc2
zabbix-frontend-php - 5.4.9rc2
zabbix-java-gateway - 5.4.9rc2
zabbix-proxy-mysql - 5.4.9rc2
zabbix-proxy-pgsql - 5.4.9rc2
zabbix-proxy-sqlite3 - 5.4.9rc2
zabbix-server-mysql - 5.4.9rc2
zabbix-server-pgsql - 5.4.9rc2
zabbix-web-service - 5.4.9rc2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zabbix package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.9rc2').
